jobDescription: Description:Leidos has an excellent opportunity for a System-on-a-Chip (SoC) Performance Modeling Engineer located in our San Diego, CA office.  The successful candidate will participate in an SoC computer processor design effort, using various processor simulation, design and analysis tools. Modeling tools include SystemC based Transaction Level Modeling (TLM) and Register Transfer Level (RTL).  External Referral Eligible  http://jobs.leidos.com/page/show/SanDiegoASGQualifications:The successful candidate will have the following skills/experience:  • Bachelor's Degree in Computer or Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or related degree and 12+ years of relevant experience or a Master's degree and 10 plus years experience. The companys 33,000 employees support vital missions for government and commercial customers.
